title: How to Cope with Tragedy and Loss
description:
The profound affect the condo collapse has had on the country spurs a conversation on death, dying, and how to find some peace with it all. Then, back to the wheel house to dispel myths on alcohol and coffee consumption, sleep, water intake and more. 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com

This Week’s Sponsors:

TRUNIAGEN.com/JILLIAN to save 10% on your first purchase
